transArray.content: The room is clean and tidy, with functional curtain opening and closing, and a robot to deliver food. The front desk service is attentive, and Ping An fruit was given as a gift when checking in. Checked out and exchanged for hand cream. Very thoughtful.

We know each other as clear as water, as bright as a mirror, and our hearts are clear and reflected. I believe you must feel our sincerity and efforts. Your praise is our pride. We look forward to seeing you again.
